website_summaries.verdict: Stylish bag with sturdy frame for packing items, and includes handy, slim ice pack to help keep foods cool.
pros: Available in 6 fashionable designs, bag has a durable, soft cotton outside and eco-friendly PEVA interior lining
Simple and easy zipper opening on top and carrying handles, with a convenient side pocket for items like keys and cell phone
cons: Check the interior dimensions of this item before purchasing, as some expected it to be larger

customer_reviews.title: Ebony Pattern
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bring my lunch to work. The design is really cute and has enough space to fit my drink and multiple food containers. I have a small appetite, so I usually bring little food compared to my coworkers. If you're someone who needs a lot of food and large Tupperware for your lunch, this bag will probably be too small for you. But it's perfect for someone like me who usually brings a sandwich, fruit, chips, salad, and other small food that I can fit in 3 or less small-medium sized food containers.
customer_reviews.author: Demi Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Loving this lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little lunch bag. The first day I took it to work, the ladies in my office all gushed over it and wanted to know where to buy one. I love that the ice pack is included. The inside is nice smooth insulation material. It's kind of small inside once you close it, though. I put 2 sandwich boxes inside, and had some trouble zipping it. My food was cold at lunch, but at the end of an 8-hour shift, the ice pack is fully melted (which is fine--just want to let you know realistic expectations--it's not going to keep a drink cold all day, for example.)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fox

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality / Design / Size
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to believe the negative reviews because this bag looks so cute - just had to order it. Now I wish I hadn't. I've had it for three weeks and the stitching on one of the handles has already let go. I have to fight with the bag to get it zipped as the design really is not user friendly and it is just too small - and that's without even using the cheap freezer pack. I'd like to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: G1naG

customer_reviews.title: No icepack just fyi people
customer_reviews.text: Unless you scroll way down to the bottom and really look where it does say it's not included the picture WITH the icepack makes it very misleading plus the other reviews stating they are glad that it came with an icepack, maybe change the picture or put it in the headline, looks like false advertising and that's irritating for people who are super busy and dont have time to scour the whole page for details on something that in multiple areas indicates it would indeed come with the icepack, based on previous reviews it did at one point update your product. Would have been five stars but nope.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Shirav

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, not as insulating as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking bag, and seems well constructed. I don't find it to be as well insulated as I had expected. Based on the reviews of this brand, I expected it to keep things cold longer. Maybe my expectations aren't realistic. This is the first time I have purchased a lunch bag, so I guess I don't have anything to compare it to. The reviews made me hope for more.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: will be buying a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition and arrived sooner than expected! It holds a lot more food and all different sized of containers better than your standard lunchbox. My daughter has spilled her drink in it at lunch and it was still in there when I emptied it at night so it's definitely leak proof! I pack lunch at 8am and don't normally unpack it until 7pm that night and the ice pack it comes with is still cold. I love it so much, I will be buying one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and functional lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag. It's the perfect size to hold several small containers (I purchased a recommended set) that allow me to control my Portion size of the varied items I need in my diet. The bag keeps everything cool and looks fashionable! I'm so glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Randirae

customer_reviews.title: Good lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy with a frame to hold open the opening of the bag. Love the design on the side of the bag. Ice pack seems to be one that will last for a long time. It could easily fit a 6-pack of pop. Handles are a good length to put your arm through to carry with a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Krayziekitten

customer_reviews.title: This lunchbag is highly durable, spacious, and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this lunch bag. The previous one, which was used to carry my glass lunch containers 5 days a week, lasted for 5 years with minor tear on the inside lining. I had to replace it when I moved to a different place. I got compliments from strangers on how stylish it looked. I was also surprised at how much stuff you could put inside. I was able to fit in 2 glass containers (1 30 oz and 1 15 oz) with extra room for fruits, yogurt, and utensils. Overall I was very happy with this bag. It definitely is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: artemis_545

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler! It keeps my lunch cold and looks good to boot. The only drawbacks are that the ice pack it comes with doesn't stay frozen for very long and it is very hard to compress the lunchbox if needed to get it to fit into a smaller space. I would still buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot! It's perfect for me to have a sandwich, some fruit, and some snacks throughout the day while I'm at work. It's not big enough for a huge water bottle in there as well, but I mostly have my water with me anyway. My only complaint is that it doesn't do the most amazing job of keeping things cold. It does an alright job, but not fantastic. For my purposes, it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item if you don't plan on zipping it shut
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know how this item received so many good reviews. It would probably be fine if you didn't want to zip it, but it is impossible to zip with a couple of containers in it. The bag itself is cute and seems well made, which is the only reason I gave it more than one star. If you plan on taking something more than a piece of fruit and some crackers for lunch I would not recommend this. Really disappointed and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my sister. Large in size and just perfect for her. She likes it too and has been using it since. Will hold plenty, can soda, sandwich, chips, fruit utensils. With room left. I don't think she uses a ice pack. They have a commercial refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Great look, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disapointed, this my second exact fit & fresh lunchbox. The stitching is poor & was coming apart within days. I carry approx 3 lbs in the bag daily. U love the design & look, just wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: nadine

customer_reviews.title: Is a nice bag. Definitely liked my 31 tote better because ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice bag. Definitely liked my 31 tote better because it fit more items in it. This works if you're only packing one meal. I usually need to take my breakfast, lunch, snack, and insulin with me. This bag really only has room for one meal and a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Brit067

customer_reviews.title: Very big, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's the only lunch bag I've ever had that fits my giant Tupperware. My container is about 7 inches long and 5 inches deep, and it's fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Riot Grrl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty roomy, I use it for school everyday. The cooler pack really keeps your food cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Broken already
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag on Sept. 4th. Today is October 23. The return window has closed and the strap on my bag has fallen apart. It is barely attached. If I had bought this at Target, I would be returning it. However, due to the fact that the window has closed here, there seems to be no option for defective materials. I would like a refund. I would like this to be fixed. My advice do not buy, this will fall apart in 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my lunch at work all the time. I find that if I leave the bag out with the ice pack in it, everything will stay cold for the entire four hours of the first half of my shift. I can't really speak past that, but it does keep everything pretty fresh. I love the design, and everything else about this lunch box!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Haun

customer_reviews.title: Super cute lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable! Perfect size, smaller but opens wide so a good bit will fit. Bought this for a new job I haven't started yet so I haven't used it yet, just reviewing on appearance and packing. Will update if changes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hope

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Shows it fits a water bottle but you can’t zip it with the bottle standing up
customer_reviews.author: Sharon N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lunchbox for some time now, and it has been great! I love the wide opening, the included ice pack, and the ease to wash it and keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this for 2 weeks and so far it's great! She loves the look of it. She places 3 drinks and 2 bags of chips. No complaints at all about this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my lunch every day. It looks stylish and keeps all my things in a pretty bag. I can usually fit 2 pieces of tupperware and some fruit and maybe a yogurt. I've never used the side pouch for anything (never had to) but that's a nice feature as well for cutlery or forks or salt and pepper pouches. It's great! I do not use the ice pack that comes with it. I never need to. I just pop this in the fridge at work and it keeps everything cool until I'm ready for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kemes

customer_reviews.title: Nice but size deceiving....
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price but outside deceiving finding inside small unable to hold 8oz water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Only order if your good with a needle
customer_reviews.text: I had it for a week and the threads attached to the zipper started unraveling. Bummed, because it's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea gonzales

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day! The chill pack keeps everything cold until lunch! The exterior pouch is not big enough for plastic ware, but holds my tea pouches just fine and will carry my smart phone (not the larger ones).
customer_reviews.author: Illinois Accounting & Tax Co, Inc

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag for small lunches. A tad bit larger and a shoulder length handle would make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ccc

customer_reviews.title: sturdy lunch bag that is just the right size for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, sturdy lunch bag that is just the right size for containers with left-overs which is what I usually take to work for lunch. Since we have a refrigerator there, I don't use the ice pack, but it's nice to know it's there if I need it. The bag resembles a purse except for the washable lining, and I like the fact that it's not flashyh.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag came with insulating ice packs that don't take up precious room inside. This bag does provide more room than the standard lunch bags, but I still find myself looking for a bit more room. The zipper is sturdy and the material is thick. I do not anticipate there will be any tears anytime soon. Also, the material emits absolutely NO odor, which some materials do.
customer_reviews.author: SDD

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend. It is cute
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious. Exactly as described. I am away from home for 12+ hours a day and this keeps my food cold for up to 8 hours. 10/10 recommend. It is cute, keeps food cold, and SO spacious. I can actually fit a twist tip Gatorade in the lunch bag on top of all of my food.
customer_reviews.author: LiAnn Seale

customer_reviews.title: I’m loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new lunch bag! Fits perfectly in my work fridge, holds all my lunch containers and I love how it comes with an ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kai's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving Photo
customer_reviews.text: Items pictured as advertisement of the product should be included with purchase. In seeing the freezer pack included, I was excited by the price and fact that once I received this product, I could begin packing cold lunches. Not the case. I will now have to make a trip to the store. This otherwise seems like a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Layhew

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for lunch and snack as well as a small drink. It's fashionable but not bulky and the food stays cold with the freezer pack.
customer_reviews.author: JCI

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Little & Big Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: Well-Designed with a large bottom and smaller top so it is cute enough to carry as a handbag. Durable & easy to clean. 6 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: QueenAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag. The shape is so much better than most. Not only can you fit wide items in it that usually will not go in a fashionable lunch bag, but you can also stack them up to the zipper and this one still closes. I use it all the time, along with the ice pack, and it has been great! The only thing they could do to improve this would be to make the front pocket a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Timetoride

customer_reviews.title: Insulated lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she absolutely loves it. Great size. Not to big....Will fit the essentials for lunch....
customer_reviews.author: Steve Trachtenberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice but shallow
customer_reviews.text: It cannot hold much but it's a cute bag. Keeps the food warm.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: A bit smaller than expected...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great lunch container. I like to carry a couple of bottles of water and found it a bit smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: CarolP913

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box with so much style
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lunch box, got it for wifey and she loves it. She thinks it’s very stylish and has enough room for her food prep meals. She’s very happy and wants another one
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just great. I would strongly advise you to order the food storage kit that fits it. They are just perfect with this!! I use it every day!!!
customer_reviews.author: skippy521

customer_reviews.title: one review was right
customer_reviews.text: Most reivews on this lunch bag were good..one reviewer stuck in my mind about the zipper not closing all the way...allowing air in, which allows your ice packs to melt faster. I have the same issue..it's great for space and fitting all you want in there but sadly....i'm shopping for another one just because it doesn't close all the way. super cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but small
customer_reviews.text: Cute lunch bag. Loved the design, seems sturdy and well built. Only problem is that it is not as big as I thought and sometimes I have difficulty fitting what I need in it for the day. The ice pack is basically useless as it defrosts within an hour but the bag is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional. Gave it to a friend ...
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and functional. Gave it to a friend as a gift and she loves it. Roomy enough for use as a mini cooler for a museum or zoo trip with kids as well as for lunch everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Golson

customer_reviews.title: Little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. It is a bit smaller than I expected especially with the way it zips, closing it takes away a lot of the room available for lunch items. Hard to fit a lunch and a water bottle inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected but functional
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I thought it would be and the way it closes makes it even harder to get things to fit. You kind of have to strategically place everything just right. But it works great, high quality, cute, and I like the pocket on the side.
customer_reviews.author: bagel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm not giving it a 5 starts is because it's not big enough. I have a squared food container with a compartment for each food group (3 total) and it barely fits in the bag. It keeps the food cool from the time I leave the house until lunch time. It came with an ice pack, which I'm sure helps. Looks really cute, you can't tell it's a lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Black Velvet

customer_reviews.title: Great little lunch bag with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag! It opens up very wide to hold sandwich containers flat and not standing up. That is the main reason I purchased it. It looks small when you first see it but once you open it up all the way you will be amazed at the room.
customer_reviews.author: Sleep Number Bed Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Use to being my lunch in everyday. Keeps it cold, easy to clean and I get compliments
customer_reviews.author: mfrance74

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and keeps items cool (but I do use an extra ice pack)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is very large when fully opened, stylish, made very well, keeps my food cold. I store in freezer. Easy to clean and wash out.
customer_reviews.author: Shoshanna

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box. Small enough for my but big enough to hold big round containers
customer_reviews.author: Christy Barron

customer_reviews.title: A BIT BIG FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: I DONT CARRY IT EVERYDAY TO WORK. IT'S A BIT BIG FOR MY WORK BAG
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag to hold my babies bottles after warming them. And also hold a few other things. I kind a wish it had a separator in the middle to keep the items in place. The front pouch is perfect for a phone!
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Durable, stylist and keeps your lunch cold. My daughter uses this every day at school (5th grade). It is abused, thrown in her backpack, dropped, spilled in and it is still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT size for lunch
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute little purse lunch bag. It seems to match a few of my shirts and everyone compliments it. The insulation could be better but the ice pack seems to keep everything cold until lunch time. I leave my house around 8:30 and eat at 2 and things are usually still cold. It looks small but actually has a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: LegallyBrunette

customer_reviews.title: Love this - perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love my new lunch bag. Not only is it cute and comes with a little ice pack but the size is EXCELLENT. I finally found a bag that is big enough on the bottom to hold my leftovers containers. I've gotten many compliments on the bag's appearance and even more when I show how big it is on the inside. It's like a Mary Poppin's lunch bag. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The shape of this bag makes it easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The shape of this bag makes it easy to carry dishes flat, rather than on their side.
customer_reviews.author: JSB

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.text: Best lunchbox ever!! My daughter loves the design and love how it opens so wide!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: ... more convertible lunch bag that would you could fold easily after it's empty
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for more convertible lunch bag that would you could fold easily after it's empty.This is better than the current one I have but doesn't fold as easliy as expected. Although the quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C. Canning

customer_reviews.title: Love this lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box! So easy to clean out, insulation and general quality is excellent. I love the slim ice pack it came with also. Keeps food cold for up to 6 hours I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Chiapperino

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome. When first received I was disappointed as it ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. When first received I was disappointed as it looks small but once you open it has lots of room for everything. Perfect for me and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sclady

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Good lunch bag I do wish the ice block stayed frozen longer but my soda is still cool by lunch I love the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice size lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch bag. It fits medium size Rubbermaid containers, and I love that it comes with a freezer pack. It fits my lunch most days, and is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Vinnacombe

customer_reviews.title: Let's do lunch
customer_reviews.text: Cute and well-made. I have actually received compliments on this lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE the bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE the bag, except it's a bit small. And one handle ripped off within two weeks. So now it's useless. All I did was carry it to and from the break room to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lunch bag for me in every way!! very cute and functional
customer_reviews.author: Julc

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cute and does keep my food cold, but I have had this less than a month and the zipper is already ripped at the seam. I doubt I will get another month of use out of this before I can't close it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Croft

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not only pretty but very convenient, the size was just right to fit a lunch bowl, fruit and snack. However, it can only fit a small water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: -N.A-

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sturdy & functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Stylish, sturdy and functional! Nice size with roomy inside. Priced right!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Bear x3

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Opens very wide
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Opens very wide, easy to get large plastic square containers in and out. It's very durable and easy to clean. The icepack keeps it cold for hours. Plus, the design is lovely. I get compliments all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot....great lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: The best lunch box ever! I really stuff this full....it holds a lot of food plus the cold pack.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi917

customer_reviews.title: ) SO much room and everything stays relatively cool inside! I managed to pack two small tupperware ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I had classes from noon to 9pm last semester, so I had to pack food (out food can be expensive, right?) SO much room and everything stays relatively cool inside! I managed to pack two small tupperware containers inside!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Literally a Mary Poppins lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lunch bag that was unique, as I notice a lot of people at my work have the same few lunch bags that Amazon recommends. This one is awesome - it's very cute, and I'm super impressed with how much stuff it can hold.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P

customer_reviews.title: It's super cute and holds an okay amount of things but ...
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute and holds an okay amount of things but it's hard to fit much in there with the other ice pack I got (I didn't trust the little ice pack it came with to keep my sandwiches at a safe temperature so I got a bigger one to use). If I used a smaller ice pack I think I would be happier with the fit but it's still a bit hard to make things fit because of how the top closes.
customer_reviews.author: Haya

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I got this lunchbag for Christmas and I love it! It fits everything nicely that I need for lunch and even has a front pocket for silverware. The ice pack keeps everything nice and cool all day long. The inside wipes down for easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: eyesclosed

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag. It’s a great size. The opening makes it easy to put your items in. The fridge at work gets very full and it gets difficult to find your lunch. With this bag my lunch stays cold at my desk. The pocket is a nice bonus. I don’t use it a lot but it’s nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Niederhauser

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box
customer_reviews.text: We had searched everywhere for a cute small functional lunch box. Amazon had the perfect one. This lunch box is the perfect size and has just the right amount of space. It comes with a freeze pack also that is slender and doesn't take up alot of room. Highly recommended for the girl in your family.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heilbrun

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: The lunch bag is well constructed, exterior pocket is deep enough to hold phone or cutlery. Insulation seems to work very well, and the ice pack is nice - thin, but covers the bottom of lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works very well. Spacious enough to fit a full meal for one person. A good look for taking lunch to the office.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient uses it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: 1 Crazy Mom Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: More beautiful than I expected. I have gotten several compliments already and requests for information on where I got it. I have never found anything similar in my local stores and it is unique, functional and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Felisha Novan

customer_reviews.title: Crushes everything when you close it
customer_reviews.text: Fits many items, but the second you close it the sides of the lunch box crush everything inside. Terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Tortorici

customer_reviews.title: The material and seams are well manufactured and zipper is perfect. I get compliments all the time on "what ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits my breakfast and lunch. The material and seams are well manufactured and zipper is perfect. I get compliments all the time on "what a pretty purse" and they are surprised when I say it's a lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I got this for work and I love it. Very roomy and the insulation and ice ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for work and I love it. Very roomy and the insulation and ice pack is great! Perfect for the beach or a hike too. I get compliments on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Best lunch bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best lunch bag ever! Made well, so it's durable & I luv the design. It's everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: becks99

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and cute lunch bag i use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Correa

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: So so worth it. Nice and roomy for just what I need. Fits a sandwich container PERFECT! Even saw a lady on the train with one and we just smiled at each other....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry my medically managed weight loss products to and from work and everywhere else. It works wonderfully and is attractive. I love how wide it opens and how much it carries: I put in three 16.9oz water bottles and still have room for four (juice box sized) shakes. It comes with a freezable insert which keeps it cold all day. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L. Tobias-Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Finally a perfect work lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: It is bigger than you think but, not too big. It is really the perfect size to take breakfast and lunch to work (I take several containers for lunch). The material is very nice and sturdy and the inside is insulated. The zipper is strong too. I'm very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Jquinter

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, for some reason I thought it was a little bigger from the looks of the picture. But the actual size is perfect for my daily work lunch bag! I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cute and functional. I have yet to try it for an extended time with only the ice pack to keep it cool, but it seems well insulated.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Erin

customer_reviews.title: The design is adorable and the ice pack is just an added bonus
customer_reviews.text: It's enormous! The design is adorable and the ice pack is just an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & functional!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for nursing school & absolutely LOVE IT! It's super cute & quite roomy. I can fit a sandwich with multiple sides & a diet coke! It's also super cute, always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalJane

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It was made out of durable material
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It was made out of durable material. Arrived on time and I love the stylish chic look.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Love this lunch pail
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch pail! It looks just like the picture, and more importantly it keeps my lunch cold for 6 hours! The fact that it comes with an ice pack is even better. It's a great size, I'm able to fit a couple of tupperwares in there and some snacks. The fabric is versatile so I can use a wider-sized tupperware if I want to. Great product with a cute design, I use it for work everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Leow

customer_reviews.title: I love this lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: The design is really cute (I get tons of compliments), the ice pack keeps things cold ALL DAY and it fits a ton of stuff. I can fit 2 sandwich size plastic containers and still have room for a can of soda, utensils, and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: finecon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I carry it to the office. It's also well-insulated and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rox019

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute & Spacey
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag. When I ordered it, I loved it just because it was pretty.. when i got it it was so much more.. It so cute and when it opens you would be amazed at what you can fit in there!!! I get compliments all the time on it too!! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. Fits what I need such as one frozen meal, fruits and vegetables. Looks like a small purse.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cox

product_meta.title: Fit & Fresh Insulated Lunch Bag, Downtown Ebony Floral
product_meta.description: Color:Ebony PatternFunctional and stylish, the Downtown is sure to be one of your favorite work accessories. The roomy interior is large enough to hold a healthy lunch, snacks and a water bottle and the interior mesh pocket and handy exterior pocket are perfect for storing your phone and keys. Its durable soft, cotton exterior comes in a variety of classic patterns. The gray PEVA lining protects against spills, is easy to clean and is BPA-free. Bag measures 9" wide X 6.75" deep X 7.75" tall.
feature_bullets: START A NEW HABIT: Bring your lunch to work 3 or more times per week - you'll save money and eat healthier.
PACK YOUR LUNCH IN STYLE: The Downtown is a stylish alternative to standard lunch boxes with a sturdy frame that makes packing a breeze.
SPACIOUS: Exterior pocket offers a convenient, accessible place to store your keys & phone and the roomy interior holds everything you need for the day.
MATERIALS YOU CAN TRUST: Has a durable, soft cotton exterior and an eco-friendly, gray PEVA lined interior that's easy to clean and BPA-free. Ice pack not included

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
